other random crap you never knew you needed somehow magically jump into your trolley… materials i recommend a 100% mercerised cotton sport weight don t use acrylic yarn as it s plastic which may melt from the heat of hot pans i used leftover bits of schachenmayr catania and scheepjes catona and a 3 5 mm e hook you ll also need those ikea cork trivets and the usual suspects darning needle and scissors as some prefer to begin rounds with standing stitches and others use chains i ve not written this out at the beginning of each round i ve put the type and total number of stitches required in each round you decide how to do the �rst stitch e g in round 1 i ve just put 12 double_crochet you can either do the �rst stitch as a standing double_crochet or chain 3 for the single_crochet rounds you can either chain 1 and then single_crochet or you can start with a standing single_crochet more on standing beginning stitches and invisible joins on the fantastic moogly blog i ve also omitted
